name: Tony Sullivan
coverLetter: I am a local Humboldtian for 7 years with quite a bit experience trimming, harvesting and other growing proceedures. My speed is roughly 65 grams an hour for most typical small nug strains, Can be much quicker on less demanding strains or larger buds.  I have transportation and would like a job that i can drive to and from. I can easily work 10-12 hour days during the week. If I worked over the weekend I can stay on sight and work 16 hours a day. (Friday-monday)
